QuestData.Title: The Smoking Gun
QuestData.Description:
The Ashvane Company doesn't know it yet, but throwing you into Tol Dagor was the biggest mistake they've ever made.
That new powder we swiped could be the key to bringing them down.
First, how about we give everyone a little demonstration of just how powerful this stuff is?
<Flynn loads a pinch of the glittering powder into his pistol.>
Go ahead, take a shot at that barrel over there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fire Flynn's Pistol at the Water Barrel in the Harbormaster's Office.
